fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 ammo to deal a Poweful attack to someone and a Basic to all their visitors.
- Use 2 ammo to deal an Unstoppable attack to someone, a Poweful to their visitors, and a Basic to everyone visiting whoever you dealt a Powerful attack
- Use 3 ammo to deal an Overkill attack to someone, an Unstoppable to their visitors, a Powerful to everyone visiting whoever you dealt an Unstoppable, and a Basic to everyone visiting whoever you dealt an Powerful attack.
- Change your goal to "Kill everyone who opposes you" and get 3 extra ammo (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 3 ammo.
- Your abilities are astral.
- Anyone who kills you will commit suicide out of guilt on the next night, unless the attack was Astral.
